Mikado Sushi and Bar
OVERVIEW
Mikado invites guests to discover unique Japanese cuisine in a warm and relaxing atmosphere. Perfect for a quick bite, business lunch, group event, or intimate dining experience, the restaurant offers an extensive sushi menu and a wide selection of wines and sakes.
